workflows.name: should complete Shopify API credential generation
workflows.intent: Generate Shopify private app API credentials for store integration
preconditions: Shopify store must exist and be accessible
Admin credentials must be available in credential vault
Store must allow private app development

steps.intent: Navigate to Apps and sales channels
Click 'Create an app' or 'Create app' button

alternatives.intent: Try 'Allow custom app development' if needed

postconditions: Credentials extracted and ready for storage
successIndicators: API scopes include read_products, write_products, read_orders
errorRecovery: If app development disabled, enable it in store settings
If authentication fails, verify credentials in vault
If scope selection fails, use alternative navigation path
Log all errors and notify user with specific failure reason
